EmailTemplate.name: ACT Sales Lead Quote Follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: Quotation Follow-up : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for your request for quotation. We provided our quote response on {!Case.Quote_Entered_Formula__c} for {!Case.CaseNumber}. We are interested in your decision and would like to move forward with placing your order as soon as possible.
If you are not placing this order, would you kindly respond with the reason as to why you are not placing this order with Honeywell. This information will help us evaluate the efficiency of our services and improve our performance for your future requests.
Thank you for your response, we value your business and patronage.
Important Note for SPEC2000 CUSTOMERS: If you placed your quotation and received your response via SPEC 2000, and wish to place your order via SPEC2000, please utilize the XX2 transaction (Acceptance of Quotation), including the Honeywell quotation number in your transmittal. If your sstem does not enable you to place your PO through XX2 against a non-SPEC2K quotation, please use XX1 and add the Honeywell quotation reference to the REMARKS field.
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Aerospace Contact Team
Please visit our improved, easier to navigate Web Portal at http://www.myaerospace.com. You can now obtain real time price and availability, place orders, and check order status online for avionics, mechanical, wheels and brakes products and exchange programs (SPEX). If you are AOG, please call us at 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099.
